`` The advent of full HD video capture on DSLR cameras has opened the doors to new and exciting possibilities to independent and emerging filmmakers,'' said Trevor Groth, director of programming, Sundance Film Festival. It is simply amazing to see how independent films are utilizing these cameras in new and exciting ways each year. They have truly changed the game.
